title: A note on the no-$(d+2)$-on-a-sphere problem
abstract:
For fixed $d\geq 3$, we construct subsets of the $d$-dimensional lattice cube
$[n]^d$ of size $n^{\frac{3}{d + 1} - o(1)}$ with no $d+2$ points on a sphere
or a hyperplane. This improves the previously best known bound of
$\Omega(n^{\frac{1}{d-1}})$ due to Thiele from 1995.
